Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Eliminates ability of legislators to earn certain perks
Summary: Eliminates ability of legislators to earn certain perks associated with transportation, including, but not limited to, frequent-flier miles and reward points for hotel stays.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to eliminating the ability of legislators to earn certain perks
